Reviews.Title: Unlocked iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Hi, I bought this iphone , because the product  description said that it is international unloked, but it is not unlocked. i am working out of United stated and, i need use this iphone in Brazil and its is unlocked does not working.I want return back this product and refund my Money back ,if the seller does not give me any solution.thanks.Your Recommendations |  Your Account  |  Amazon.comOrder ConfirmationOrder #114-8138786-6993862Hello amorim,Order DetailsOrder #114-8138786-6993862Placed on Friday, November 29, 2013  Apple iPhone 5 64GB (Black) - SprintWireless Phone AccessorySold by Warehouse Deals, IncCondition: Used - GoodAbout this itemDescriptionClean ESN, International Unlocked. Also in the box all the manuals, usb cable, wall adapter and headphones wrapped in plastic.Features & detailsNew iPhoneSize 64 GB
